text: Robert Stephen Mallard (born 19 May 1992) is an English actor, best known for playing the role of Daniel Osbourne in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 2016 onwards. He is the third actor to play the role, replacing Lewis Harney and Dominic Holmes. He was born in Manchester, England. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Gay men Category:English LGBT people Category:LGBT entertainers Category:Actors from Manchester
title: Rob Mallard
